name: psitransfer
description: PsiTransfer is a self-hosted simple file sharing solution for temporary uploads with expiration. It features drag-and-drop support, multi-user uploads, and direct download links.
features: Temporary file sharing: Upload files for temporary sharing with automatic expiration after set time periods.
Drag-and-drop uploads: Upload files by dragging them into the browser for quick sharing.
Multi-file support: Upload multiple files simultaneously in a single transfer session.
Direct download links: Generate unique URLs for each upload that recipients can access directly.
Expiration control: Set custom expiration times for uploads to automatically delete files after sharing.
Password protection: Optionally protect uploads with passwords for secure file sharing.
Upload tracking: Monitor active uploads with progress indicators and transfer statistics.
No registration required: Share files without requiring sender or recipient accounts.
Mobile responsive: Upload and download files from mobile devices with an optimized interface.
Storage management: Automatically clean up expired files to manage disk space efficiently.
Lightweight design: Minimal resource requirements suitable for personal or small team use.
Download notifications: Optionally notify uploaders when files are downloaded by recipients.
